summary.text: Tesla's third-quarter production numbers fell short of targets due to supply chain disruptions in China. Company produced 430,000 vehicles vs 450,000 expected. Delivery guidance reduced for Q4. Stock down 4.2% in after-hours. Management cites component shortages and logistics challenges as key factors.
